data.text: Hwɛ sɛnea sikakɔkɔɔ ayera ne hyerɛn no ni
Hwɛ sɛnea Sion mmabarima a wodi mu
Mpo adompo yi wɔn nufu
Osukɔm nti, akokoaa tɛkrɛma
Wɔn a na anka wodi nnuan pa no
Me nkurɔfo asotwe
Na wɔn ahenemma ho twa sen sukyerɛmma,
Nanso mprempren de, wobiri sen wusiw bɔtɔ;
Wɔn a wɔtotɔɔ wɔ afoa ano no ye koraa
Mmea a wɔwɔ ayamhyehye
Awurade ada nʼabufuwhyew nyinaa adi;
Asase so ahemfo annye anni,
Nanso esii, nʼadiyifo no bɔne
Afei wɔkeka wɔ mmɔnten so
Nnipa teɛteɛɛ mu gu wɔn so se, “Mumfi ha nkɔ! Mo ho ntew!”
Awurade ankasa abɔ wɔn ahwete;
Nea ɛka ho bio, yɛn ani anni ammoa yɛn,
Nnipa dii yɛn ntɛntɛnso wɔ yɛn anammɔntu mu,
Yɛn ataafo ho yɛ hare
Nea Awurade asra no ngo, yɛn nkwa home ankasa no,
Di ahurusi na ma wʼani nnye, Edom Babea,
Ɔbabea Sion, wʼasotwe bɛba awiei;
